page.title: 20SURVEY OF PETS AT SCHOOL
page.content: We asked all the children in the school their favourite pets,& ones they possesed.The survey shows that cats are most popular animal,followed by dogs & rabbits.The pets throughout the school were;-cats 39,dogs 33, rabbits 29, fish 23, chickens & frogs 12,guinea pigs 11,hamsters 10,ducks 9, & a few horses, budgies, peacock, silkworm, caterpillars, a mouse, one donkey, tortoises & a pet lamb.The most extraordinary pets you wouldn't expect people to keep were a peacock, silkworms,a worm & a donkey & even frogs.Frogs are very popular indeed at the moment. In the village cats were the most popular followed by dogs & fish.The other popular pets were rabbits, tadpoles,chickens,birds,ponies,a dove, guinea pigs,tortoises & hamsters.Less people have pets than did.
